mapper.select: select review_id, member_id, registered_book_id, content, star, review_date from review where registered_book_id=#{registered_book_id} order by review_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into review(member_id, content, star, review_date, registered_book_id) values(#{member_id}, #{content}, #{star}, #{review_date}, #{registered_book_id})
